alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 05 at 8:13AM CDT until June 10 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Neosho River near Commerce affecting Ottawa County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neosho River near Commerce. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, minor agricultural flooding occurs. Riverview Park experiences minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 16.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Sunday afternoon. The river will slowly begin to rise again starting Monday afternoon and will reach flood stage of 15.0 feet early Thursday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
